docs.title: Who am I

docs.text: MkDocs Tutorial Installation Run pip install mkdocs to install. Check if installed: mkdocs --version Quick Start Local Work Change directory to your workspace, and run mkdocs new dir_name to init a mkdocs dir. Serve on localhost: mkdocs serve Build sites: mkdocs build Remote Work First, create a repo on Github manually. Then run as follows: git init git remote add origin https://github.com/your_username/your_repo.git # run in your mkdocs dir, this will automatically run git push to gh-pages branch mkdocs gh-deploy Don't forget to set your repo githubpage: Settings-Pages-Source(Deploy from a branch)-Branch(gh-pages, /(root)) References Material for MkDocs(Official) so easy！从头教你用mkdocs构建个人博客系统~ Thanks Above
docs.title: MkDocs

docs.text: Run pip install mkdocs to install. Check if installed: mkdocs --version

docs.text: Change directory to your workspace, and run mkdocs new dir_name to init a mkdocs dir. Serve on localhost: mkdocs serve Build sites: mkdocs build

Then run as follows: git init git remote add origin https://github.com/your_username/your_repo.git # run in your mkdocs dir, this will automatically run git push to gh-pages branch mkdocs gh-deploy Don't forget to set your repo githubpage: Settings-Pages-Source(Deploy from a branch)-Branch(gh-pages, /(root))
